images.prompt: Create an infographic explaining brick kiln detection: Sentinel-2 RGB bands → preprocessing → deep model → oriented bounding boxes → compliance map. Use earthy palette and real satellite textures.

Design a split-panel infographic.
Left side: "Traditional Physics-Based Model (WRF–CAMx)" with visuals of differential equations, 3D atmosphere grid, CPU clusters, slow runtime indicators.
Right side: "Neural Emulator" with a neural network diagram, GPUs, fast inference, real-time forecasting.
Include inputs: emissions, meteorology, topography, and outputs: PM2.5 concentration maps.
Use bold colors and clean icons.
Generate an infographic explaining differences between natural RGB imagery; thermal imagery; and charts; esp. from perspective of say VLMs
Generate an infographic of PM2.5 continuous monitoring stations in India
